item.title: This is a super article !
item.description: Multi-line metadata should be supported as well as **inline markup**.

item.title: Oh yeah !
item.description:
## Why not ?
After all, why not ? It's pretty simple to do it, and it will allow me to write my blogposts in rst ! YEAH !
